name: Collage Orcs · 瑞 Christmas Deer
description:
Rudolph, Santa's lead deer, slipped out and fell in love with a local plum deer while Santa was passing through China. But Rudolph soon left with Santa. He didn't know that a Christmas deer was born that winter, named "瑞" in Chinese.

Rui has inherited his father's ability to run in the sky and bring auspiciousness. Its antlers grow the fruit of life every hundred years, and if humans could eat it, they could live to be 100 years old. It often comes late at night to bring the fruits of life to some good people.

鲁道夫Rudolph是圣诞老人的领头鹿，它在圣诞老人途经中国时悄溜出去与当地的一只梅花鹿相爱了。但鲁道夫Rudolph很快并随着圣诞老人离去，它不知道的是一只圣诞小鹿在这个冬天悄悄诞生了，中文名为瑞。

瑞很好的继承了父亲的能力，可天上奔跑，带去吉瑞之意。它的鹿角百年能结出一颗人生果，人类若能吃得并可活到百岁。它常在深夜降临为一些善良的人带去果子。
